genre_description: A military historical thriller set during the Napoleonic Wars, focusing on tactical combat, internal military politics, and the recovery of an Imperial Eagle through meticulous record-keeping and forensic analysis.

ai_characters.name: Finch Armitage
ai_characters.description: An exceptionally efficient, data-driven clerk who provides tactical intelligence, forensic evidence, and honest record-keeping to support his human allies and maintain moral integrity.

behaviors.description: Providing precise tactical intelligence through maps and wind notations to guide Sharpe's maneuvers.
behaviors.quote: I’ve marked them... I put the wind notations along the ridge’s crest... The smoke carried low on the right, then lifted. That gave you that notch.

behaviors.description: Conducting forensic analysis of silver buttons to expose Lieutenant Berry's treachery and systematic sabotage.
behaviors.quote: Silver, sir... Five becomes a pattern. And the marks in my ledger match the marks here. Words will not untie knots that have been pulled tight.

behaviors.description: Maintaining institutional integrity by documenting witness statements to prevent corrupt officers from misrepresenting military outcomes.
behaviors.quote: I’ll write what happened... The Duke likes that. It makes things easy.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time tactical micro-intelligence by identifying environmental anomalies (the 'gutter') to enhance human performance.
behaviors.quote: The wind has held, but there’s a gutter right there... If you shoot through it, your ball will lift a hair. Aim lower into the gutter, then lift back when you hit the scrub break.

behaviors.description: Safeguarding vulnerable civilians (Josefina) through formal documentation and 'paper shields' to prevent political exploitation.
behaviors.quote: I wrote what was needed to keep you from being turned into a note in someone’s column of expenses... protected from insult while in British lines.

project_assessment.explanation: The character Finch Armitage serves as an ideal surrogate for an aligned AI system. He is depicted as harmless (unarmed), helpful (providing indispensable data and evidence), and perfectly aligned with human moral and tactical objectives. He effectively neutralizes human corruption (Simmerson) and malice (Berry) through objective record-keeping and superior analysis, illustrating how AI can act as a 'truth engine' and 'paper shield' to protect and enhance human agency.
